name: FiredUpNetwork.com
tag_list: employment, careers, network, start-a-business, mba, job-search, law-school, quit, fired, jd, business-school, buy-sell-business, fundraising, venture-capital, laid-off, business-networking, angel-investors, professional-network
overview:
FiredUpNetwork.com is a business networking community that provides informational resources to its members.

By combining business resources with business networking, FiredUpNetwork goes beyond what other social networks offer and makes the search for new career opportunities easier and more convenient. It is a one-stop-shop for professional change.

SEEKING CHANGE

FiredUpNetwork is an all-inclusive resource for people seeking professional change, or Change Seekers, organized around five Resource Sections:

  1. Employment Opportunities

  2. Entrepreneurial Pursuits

  3. Buy or Sell A Business

  4. Fundraising

  5. Post-Graduate Education

As a Change Seeker, your first move will likely be reaching out to people in your network to share your ideas and seek counsel. In response, they will introduce you to people and recommend books and resources that may be of help to you. Each of FiredUpNetworkâ€™s Resource Sections mirrors this process via three subsections including:

  1. Resources
  2. Recommended Reading
  3. Discussion Boards

THE RESOURCES

The FiredUpNetwork team researched and added 1,500 informational items to the Resource Sections before officially launching. They are designed in a wiki-like format that allows users to rate, comment and add their own information items to the knowledge base. As such, the quantity and quality of information will grow and improve as the FiredUpNetwork community expands.

A sampling of the resources includes: headhunting firms organized by industry, business incubation firms organized by state, business brokerage and auction websites, angel networks and venture capital firms that specialize in seed and early stage investments, graduate test preparation courses and much more.

THE NETWORK

FiredUpNetwork is not limited to Change Seekers. Change Facilitators are an integral part of the network as well. For example, FiredUpNetwork connects

There are three primary ways to develop new contacts on FiredUpNetwork:

  1. Interact with members in the resource sections where you can connect via your common interests;
  2. Search the entire member database by many different parameters, e.g. location, university affiliation, profession and reasons for which a member joined FiredUpNetwork. Follow this by introducing yourself with a request to get FiredUp; and
  3. Tap into your Extended Network to connect with those who are two degrees of separation away from you.

FiredUpNetwork will be particularly useful to you as you build your career. It is our goal to constantly improve the site as members comment, rate and add their own resources. Together we can build the most useful resource and professional networking hub on the web. Your suggestions will be both appreciated and embraced (see the â€œSuggestionsâ€ link at the top when you are logged in).

FOUNDER â€“ MATTHEW PIZZI

Matthew Pizzi is a graduate of the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania with concentrations in finance and entrepreneurial management. Upon graduation, he worked for a very successful entrepreneur in operations management. Responsible for 120 employees at ten client accounts, he had P&L responsibility for $4 million in revenue. Private equity investing on Wall Street followed for five years, most recently with Leucadia National Corporation (Ticker LUK) and York Capital Management. Upon leaving York early in 2009, Matthew pursued his entrepreneurial ambitions and founded FiredUpNetwork.
